name: Rocketfella
description:
ROCKETFELLA

Use the force of your jetpack to smash through platforms, roasting goons as you go! Keep an eye out for a safe place to land to re-fuel your jetpack. Whenever you take a hit, your jetpack becomes less reliable - collect canisters to repair it.

"Rocketfella is off doing its own thing with a big emphasis on crazy jetpack fueled antics over gunplay and a more integral element to its environmental destruction mechanics ... Keep an eye out for this one." - Super Game Droid

Keyboard Controls: ← ↑ →

The Demo

In its current state, the demo won't let you unlock the jetpacks you can see in the screenshots (sorry!). Instead, you'll be allowed most of the rest of the game - and you'll still unlock new palettes.

The Real Deal

Set for release in March 2016, the full game will feature all jetpacks fully unlockable, along with many new challenges and opponents to overcome. It will be released for Android and desktop devices, with other formats to follow.

Rocketfella is looking for musicians!

Yeah, you might want to put that placeholder music on mute, guys. If you are, or know of, a talented chiptune artist who would like to contribute some up-tempo dirty industrial and militaristic beats, get in touch!

Twitter @chilly_durango
Rocketfella Facebook Page

UPDATES
2016/02/06 - Weapons and crates added, camera tweaked
2016/02/08 - Audio and tilemap tweaks & flamethrower bug fix
2016/02/10 - Bugfix allowing the game to run on certain mobile devices
